txt.en:
'Now that we have weakened the defences of the goblin-camp below, we may soon be in a position to launch a full assault against them.

'Go down there and see if you cannot defeat a few of the goblins' overseers. With the strongest goblins out of the way, the weaker ones will be unable to unite against us.

'Much depends upon your success, [placeholder]. Be careful!'
'Your courage knows no bounds, [placeholder]. We are nearly ready to strike at their camp.'
'With the overseers organizing the goblins down there, it's only a matter of time before they amass together to destroy us. See that they do not get the chance!'
The goblins encamped below the Dolven-view have become a great threat to the dwarves, driven by their overseers to greater violence than is usual for them.

Goblin-overseers can be found in and around the encampment Gazatmur.\n\nSlagvi told you that the goblin-overseers must be defeated if the goblin-encampment threatening the Dolven-view is to be destroyed.
Wigfast can be found at his hiding spot near Gazatmur in the Great Delving.\n\nYou should return to Wigfast and inform him that the goblins' overseers have been defeated.
